column4: hi folks, i'm trying to get X configured and started on my Ubuntu Feisty Fawn install - i did a server install (which is mostly what i wanted), but i'd like to get X up on the console.  I did an aptitude uinstall KDE, which got most in, but xinit is saying /etc/X11/X is not found.  What's the configuration step for building / configuring the X server?
as far as you know? lol i'd double check since your computer seems to be disagreeing with you
mm, package name to try?  x11? x? xorg?
